conbody.p: The water heaters covered in this manual are certified for the use of four- and six-inch pipe for the vent (exhaust) and intake air piping. If the installed equivalent length for the intake air or vent piping will be 70 feet (21.3 m) or less, 4 inch pipe must be used. If the installed equivalent length will be more than 70 feet (21.3 m), 6 inch pipe must be used.

note.p: Install the pipe size required for the installed equivalent length of each pipe independently. IE: If the intake air pipe will be 70 equivalent feet or less and the vent pipe will be more than 70 equivalent feet; the intake air pipe must be installed using 4 inch pipe and the vent must be installed using 6 inch pipe.
